data.title: Wake Forest University
data.meta_description: Will Gervase (1) LHP - Sophomore (2024) Appeared in eight games out of the bullpen... Struck out five batters in 4.1 innings... Struckout a season high two b...
data.text:
Sophomore (2024)

Appeared in eight games out of the bullpen... Struck out five batters in 4.1 innings... Struckout a season high two batters in a scoreless inning against Elon (March 3)... Threw a scoreless frame against North Carolina A&T (May 8).

Prior to Wake Forest

2022 (at Pitt CC)

Made 5 appearances at Pitt Community College last season... Earned a 2-0 record in 14.2 innings of work... Struck out 22 batters, including seven in 3.2 against Richard Bland College.

Personal

Comes from an athletic family... Brother Paul played at LSU before being selected in the 12th Round of the MLB Draft by the New York Mets in 2022... Sister Lily just completed her freshman season with Virginia volleyball where she appeared in 34 sets across 15 matches.
